amendment.description: Amendment prohibits the use of funds from being used to seize property as a means of enforcing the liability provisions of the District of Columbia individual mandate.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 85 printed in House Report 115-830 to prohibit the funds from being used to seize property as a means of enforcing the liability provisions of the District of Columbia individual mandate.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Rothfus amendment (A079) Agreed to by recorded vote: 231 - 184 (Roll no. 361).

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A079) offered by Mr. Rothfus.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Rothfus amendment (A079) Agreed to by recorded vote: 231 - 184 (Roll no. 361).
